description.narrative: The proposed project is an investment of up to US$150 million equivalent in Turkish lira in the Mortgage Covered Bond to be issued by Türkiye Garanti Bankasi AS (Garanti Bank or the Bank). The bond to be issued by the Bank will be backed by receivables arising under the Banks mortgage portfolio, including green mortgages. The proceeds of the sale of the bond will be used to support the Banks lending operations in green mortgages to individuals in Turkey.
